source.interface:
* This interface represents the luminous flux density per solid angle as * measured in a given direction relative to the emitting source. * The system unit for this quantity is "cd" (candela). Jean-Marie Dautelle 1.0, January 14, 2006
* Holds the SI unit (Système International d'Unités) for this quantity.
<declaration type="Unit" name="UNIT" />
